name: 陳協慶
objective:
本課程教授數值分析之基本理論，使學生能夠
(1)撰寫運算程式(2)應用數值方法求解各類型數學問題
內容包括誤差分析、非線性方程式求解（二分法、牛頓法、截線法）、泰勒展開式與Lagrange內差法、高斯消去與LU分解法、非線性系統求解、曲線擬合與富利葉逼近、數值微分與積分、微分方程式求解、最佳化問題求解等
schedule:
Wk#1: Introduction to MS Excel; Bracketing Methods for Locating a Root
Wk#2: Newton-Raphson and Secant Methods
Wk#3: Review of Taylor Series; Number Representation; Number Representation and Errors; Error Analysis
Wk#4: Interpolation and Lagrange Approximation
Wk#5: Quiz#1
Wk#6: Numerical Differentiation Formulas
Wk#7: Numerical Integration
Wk#8: Midterm Exam.
Wk#9: Gaussian Elimination
Wk#10: LU Decomposition,Pivoting and Triangular Factorization
Wk#11: Curve Fitting and Least-squares
Wk#12: Interpolation by Spline Function
Wk#13: Double Integral Method
Wk#14: Quiz#2
Wk#15: Minimization of a Function
Wk#16: Minimization of a Function
Wk#17: Ordinary Differential Equations
Wk#18: Final
materials: Textbook: Numerical Methods Using MATLAB, Jhon. & Kurtis. (台北圖書代理)
